statements: SELECT * FROM MedicalTeam WHERE team_id = 1;
SELECT team_name, surgeon_name, nurse_name FROM MedicalTeam WHERE team_id > 3;
SELECT * FROM MedicalTeam WHERE surgeon_name LIKE 'Dr.%';
SELECT team_id, robot_model FROM MedicalTeam WHERE nurse_name = 'Mary';
SELECT team_name, assistant_name FROM MedicalTeam WHERE robot_model = 'Model X';
SELECT * FROM MedicalTeam ORDER BY team_name DESC;
SELECT team_name, surgeon_name, assistant_name, nurse_name FROM MedicalTeam WHERE surgeon_name='Dr. Smith';
SELECT team_name, robot_model FROM MedicalTeam WHERE nurse_name='Mary Johnson';
SELECT surgeon_name AS main_surgeon, assistant_name AS second_surgeon, robot_model FROM MedicalTeam ORDER BY surgeon_name ASC;
SELECT team_id, team_name, surgeon_name, assistant_name, nurse_name, robot_model FROM MedicalTeam WHERE team_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM surgeons;
SELECT name, specialty FROM surgeons ORDER BY specialty;
SELECT id, name, experience_years FROM surgeons WHERE experience_years > 5;
SELECT * FROM surgeries ORDER BY date DESC;
SELECT surgery_name, surgeon_id, assistant1_id, assistant2_id FROM surgeries WHERE surgeon_id = 3;
SELECT * FROM surgeons WHERE specialty = 'Neurology';
SELECT name, experience_years FROM surgeons WHERE status = 'Active' ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT surgery_name, date FROM surgeries WHERE surgeon_id = 2 AND assistant1_id = 4 AND assistant2_id = 7;
SELECT MAX(experience_years), MIN(experience_years) FROM surgeons;
SELECT * FROM surgeons WHERE specialty LIKE 'Orthopedic%' ORDER BY experience_years ASC, name DESC;
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, specialization FROM teams ORDER BY specialization DESC;
SELECT surgeon_name, team_id FROM surgeons WHERE team_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
SELECT procedure_name, surgeon_id FROM procedures WHERE surgeon_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174001' ORDER BY procedure_name;
SELECT team_name, count(*) as total_procedures FROM teams LEFT JOIN procedures ON teams.team_id = procedures.team_id GROUP BY team_name ORDER BY total_procedures DESC;
SELECT * FROM teams;
SELECT team_name, specialization FROM teams ORDER BY team_name ASC;
SELECT surgeon_name, team_name FROM surgeons JOIN teams ON surgeons.team_id = teams.team_id;
SELECT * FROM procedures WHERE team_id = '9b5ba5b9-8dc2-4c04-9453-1632752580a1' ORDER BY procedure_name ASC;
SELECT surgeon_name, procedure_name FROM surgeons JOIN procedures ON surgeons.surgeon_id = procedures.surgeon_id WHERE surgeons.team_id = '9b5ba5b9-8dc2-4c04-9453-1632752580a1';
SELECT * FROM surgeons;
SELECT id, name FROM surgeons ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT name, specialty FROM surgeons WHERE specialty = 'Orthopedic';
SELECT surgeon_id, COUNT(surgery_id) FROM surgeries GROUP BY surgeon_id;
SELECT patients.name, surgeries.surgery_name FROM patients JOIN surgeries ON patients.surgery_id = surgeries.surgery_id;
SELECT name, specialty FROM surgeons WHERE specialty = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, age FROM patients WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age ASC, name ASC;
SELECT surgery_name, date, surgeons.name FROM surgeries JOIN surgeons ON surgeries.surgeon_id = surgeons.id WHERE surgeons.specialty = 'Neurology';
SELECT robot_name, manufacturer FROM robotics WHERE manufacturer LIKE 'Da Vinci%';

SELECT surgeons.name AS surgeon_name, surgeries.surgery_name, patients.name AS patient_name FROM surgeons INNER JOIN surgeries ON surgeons.id = surgeries.surgeon_id INNER JOIN patients ON surgeries.surgery_id = patients.surgery_id ORDER BY surgeon_name ASC, patient_name DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_doctors;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM team_doctors WHERE hospital_name = 'General Hospital';
SELECT nurse_name, experience_years FROM team_nurses ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT technician_name, expertise_area FROM team_technicians WHERE available = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM surgical_procedures WHERE date_time > CURRENT_TIMESTAMP;
SELECT doctor_name, specialization FROM team_doctors WHERE hospital_name = 'City Hospital';
SELECT nurse_name, experience_years FROM team_nurses WHERE assigned_team_id = 3 ORDER BY experience_years DESC;
SELECT * FROM team_technicians WHERE expertise_area = 'Cardiology' AND available = TRUE;
SELECT procedure_name, complexity_level, date_time FROM surgical_procedures WHERE date_time > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY complexity_level;
SELECT team_id, procedure_id, assignment_date FROM surgical_team_assignments WHERE completion_status = FALSE ORDER BY assignment_date ASC;
